FR:
We recommend
555 kg of Urea
915 kg of NPK15_15_15 for the area of your field.
This will cost NGN 238,800.
 We expect an extra production of 37 tonnes of fresh storage roots, and a net value increase of NGN 1,617,900.

parameters.name: area
parameters.description: The are is computed in hectares by default

parameters.name: plantingMonth
parameters.description: 12 months will be added to the plantingMont to get the harvestMonth to allow computing of recommendations

parameters.name: maxInv
parameters.description: Maximum amount the farmer is willing to invest in their farm

parameters.name: cassUp
parameters.description: Unit price of cassava, the unit is measured in tonnes
